REM CONFIG CRC IS 94F7
HW_RESET_I2C,00,
SLEEP,00,2000,
NCI_CORE_RESET,00,
NCI_CORE_INIT,0000,
SLEEP,00,200
REM RESET THE CUSTOMER FIELD
NCI_SEND_PROP,0F,02,040006010008000000000000a5a5
SLEEP,00,200
REM HARDWARE CONFIGURATION
NCI_SEND_PROP,0F,02,040002010024011204138801F404000303FF08020305006400000503E8000A0064000303FF0000000000
SLEEP,00,200
REM Writing CustomA RF Parameters
NCI_SEND_PROP,0F,02,
REM Writing CustomB RF Parameters
NCI_SEND_PROP,0F,02,040010010154C059680200040242040402420303103D3D3D3D3D3D3D3D2C2C2DE0E0E000E0E0E000BCBCE00000000000000000000000404040E040404040404040B1B4B444B5B5B5450000000000000000000000000000000000
REM Set DPC table
NCI_DIRECT_CTRL,2F,02,04000301004AB90D0A0E530E9B0ECF0ECF0ECF0ECF0ECB0ECF0ECE0ECD0ECE0ECF0ECF0ECF0E6B066B066B066D066E066D06E3065507BF0725088708E5083F099709E5091F0AB80BB80BB80BFFFFFF0B
SLEEP,00,200
REM WRITE CONFIGURATION CRC IN THE CUSTOMER FIELD
NCI_SEND_PROP,0F,02,04000601000800000000000094F7
SLEEP,00,200
HW_RESET_I2C,00,
SLEEP,00,2000,
NCI_CORE_RESET,00,
NCI_CORE_INIT,0000,
REM MATCHING ;120;0.9;76;Differential;Yes;15;560;No;No;100;75;1500
REM CONFIGURATION ;6418.67777777778;880.752161690235;1.99721147859366;No;No;Differential;Yes;75;560;188;450;DNP;2200;100;4.5
